name: ADHDean
description:
Game made for TriJam #210, Theme: Distractions!

Ran out of time so the game was not completed, but it was great to build, at least you get to enjoy a nice tune I found on OpenGameArt.org by Zander Noriega.

Original synopsis: Play as Dean, who has ADHD and has to get through the day and learn as much as he can while many distractions occur through out the day keeping him from learning as much as he can.

You'll need to attend to those distractions to keep you from learning through out the day.
